name: Théo ALHOMSI
position: Trade Advisor - Tech & Services - French Embassy  |  Master In International Project Negotiation
about: Passionate about intercultural and international business relations, I have completed a Master in International Project Negotiation in Montpellier. This program aims to train specialists who combine linguistic skills, intercultural know-how and interpersonal skills with the practice of negotiation and project management.

current_company.name: Business France Middle East

experience.title: Trade Advisor - Tech & Services - French Embassy
experience.description: Dubai- Mobilization of the region's partners to meet our French companies during collective operations.- Support for the realization of support services (market research, market tests, prospecting missions, trade shows, networking events).- Creation and updating of sectorial and competitive intelligence, market studies, etc.

education.title: Université Paul Valéry - Montpellier 3
education.description: Activities and Societies: - Communication courses in English, Arabic, and French - Negotiation tools - Business Strategy - International Relations - Project management The objective of the Master's degree in is to train specialists who combine language skills, intercultural know-how and interpersonal skills with the practice of negotiation and project management. It offers diversified theoretical and practical courses that train students to be immediately operational in private companies as well as in public and semi-public organizations. Students are required to participate in a number of concrete projects and a compulsory six-month internship in France or… Show more

education.field: Applied Foreign languages, International Relations and Affaires
education.description: Activities and Societies: Languages: Arabic and English Law Management Marketing The L.E.A degree offers in-depth instruction in two chosen languages (English & Arabic) in the areas of language, translation, civilization (societies, recent history, geography, economics, socio-politics, media), and written and oral expression. It also offers multidisciplinary teaching on the learning of methodological tools (synthesis of documents, report, dissertation, discovery of the world of work by professionals and former students) and in the fields of economics, law and language… Show more

education.title: LSF Montpellier | French Language School
education.description: LSF Montpellier is a private institution for higher education, one of the most established and well-known French language schools in France with 2 800 students from all over the world coming to us to learn French in France every year. Since 1996 LSF has organised language stays in Montpellier for adults and juniors, groups and individuals, with a friendly family atmosphere and a great nationality and age mix in the courses.
